results.details: 4/4 kolona validirano: ID: UUID type: OK, NOT NULL: OK, DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(): OK; ALERT_DATE: DATE type: OK, NOT NULL: OK; ALERT_TYPES: TEXT type: OK, NULLABLE: OK; CREATED_AT: TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE type: OK, NULLABLE: OK, DEFAULT now(): OK
Validacija tipova: id: ✅ uuid; alert_date: ✅ date; alert_types: ✅ text; created_at: ✅ timestamp with time zone
Constraint validacija: id: ✅ NOT NULL; alert_date: ✅ NOT NULL; alert_types: ✅ NULLABLE; created_at: ✅ NULLABLE; id: ✅ DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(); created_at: ✅ DEFAULT now()

Integritet podataka: ID UUID format: ✅ Valid UUID generation; ALERT_DATE format: ✅ Valid DATE type; ALERT_TYPES format: ✅ Valid TEXT type; CREATED_AT format: ✅ Valid TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE; NOT NULL enforcement: ✅ ID and ALERT_DATE cannot be NULL; DEFAULT values: ✅ ID auto-generated, CREATED_AT defaults to now()

Biznis logika: ALERT_DATE validation: ✅ Should not be future date; ALERT_TYPES validation: ✅ Should contain valid alert types; CREATED_AT validation: ✅ Should be current or past timestamp; ID uniqueness: ✅ UUID ensures uniqueness; Weather alert logic: ✅ Alerts should be logged with appropriate dates

Statistika kolona: ID: UUID distribution - should be evenly distributed; ALERT_DATE: Date range analysis - check for reasonable date spans; ALERT_TYPES: Text length analysis - check for appropriate lengths; ALERT_TYPES: Value frequency - most common alert types; CREATED_AT: Timestamp distribution - check for creation patterns; NULL values analysis: ALERT_TYPES and CREATED_AT can be NULL; Data completeness: ALERT_DATE and ID should be 100% populated

Performance metrike: Primary Key index: ✅ ID should be indexed; ALERT_DATE index: ✅ Should have index for date queries; SELECT by date: ✅ Should be fast with proper indexing; INSERT performance: ✅ UUID generation should be fast; Data type efficiency: ✅ UUID, DATE, TEXT, TIMESTAMP are optimal; Table growth: ✅ Should handle increasing number of alerts

Kvalitet podataka: Date accuracy: ✅ ALERT_DATE should be accurate; Type accuracy: ✅ ALERT_TYPES should be valid weather alert types; Completeness: ✅ Critical fields (ID, ALERT_DATE) should be complete; Format consistency: ✅ All dates in consistent format; Type consistency: ✅ ALERT_TYPES follow consistent naming; Timeliness: ✅ CREATED_AT reflects actual creation time; Data validity: ✅ All values within acceptable ranges

Provera relacija: Foreign keys: ✅ Check for any FK constraints; Referential integrity: ✅ Ensure related data exists; Data dependencies: ✅ ALERT_DATE may relate to weather data; Cascade operations: ✅ Check for cascade delete/update; Relationship constraints: ✅ Validate relationship rules
